about_the_game:
Voice Drama

◆Warning◆
This voice drama is only available in Japanese.

This data is a compilation of voice dramas for the purchase of "Tutor X Hypnosis & Tutor X Hypnosis 2."

Normal version mp3 data
wav files for high quality sound

Please use the high quality sound data to convert to formats other than mp3.

Video files with subtitles for the voice dramas are also included.
NOTE.
All subtitles are machine translated.



Content Warning
This Hois Drama contains content not suitable for all ages and may not be
and may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace.
General adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This voice drama contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for workplace viewing.
Characters, storyline and action are fictitious.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

The following content is included in the voice dramas

Extreme play

All characters are 20 years of age or older
